short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension replaces kana in etoeto by known Kanji from Wanikani

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add your WaniKani api key in the chrome extensions options.

It will convert kana into kanji you know from WaniKani (depending on your level):

- It does not convert single kana (に into 二)

Warning: It's a proof of concept, I have not made any caching and since it is only based on the kana, you might get another character that uses similar kana.
